dbxml.uploader

Class SpecWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbxml.uploader.SpecWriter

  • public class SpecWriter
extends Object
    This class writes Specification XML as determined by the options passed to UploadWorker from the ImportFrame GUI
    Author:
    sherbert
